column2: an A.M. Eatery////I honestly don't know what the craze is about Snooze. I'm be been here several times and the service is sub-par at best and the food is really nothing special.  I've had the egg and potato burrito which was A LOT more potato than egg
column3: the corn beef hash which lacked flavor and the pancakes which were decent but then again if you can't make good pancakes
column4: then you should def not be open for breakfast.  The only thing I'm really impressed with are the hash browns b/c they taste awesome w/a little bit of ketchup.
